column3: Description
column4: Test Steps
column5: Expected Results

column3: Verify Azure DevOps organization creation and configuration
column4: 1. Validate organization exists 2. Check process template 3. Verify AD integration 4. Test user access
column5: Organization created with correct configuration and SSO working

column3: Test single sign-on authentication with Azure AD
column4: 1. Configure SSO 2. Test user login 3. Verify group mappings 4. Test MFA enforcement
column5: Users authenticate via Azure AD with MFA enforcement

column3: Validate Git repository creation and branch policies
column4: 1. Create test repository 2. Configure branch policies 3. Test code push 4. Verify PR workflow
column5: Repositories created with branch policies enforced

column3: Test continuous integration pipeline execution
column4: 1. Configure YAML pipeline 2. Trigger build 3. Verify compilation 4. Check artifact creation
column5: CI pipeline executes successfully and produces artifacts

column3: Validate continuous deployment to target environments
column4: 1. Configure release pipeline 2. Set approval gates 3. Deploy to staging 4. Verify deployment
column5: CD pipeline deploys to environments with proper approvals

column3: Test container image push and vulnerability scanning
column4: 1. Push test image 2. Trigger vulnerability scan 3. Review results 4. Test image pull
column5: Images stored with vulnerability scanning results available

column3: Validate AKS cluster deployment and pod scheduling
column4: 1. Verify cluster health 2. Deploy test pod 3. Check networking 4. Test auto-scaling
column5: AKS cluster operational with pods scheduled correctly

column3: Test secrets retrieval in pipeline execution
column4: 1. Store test secret 2. Configure pipeline access 3. Retrieve in build 4. Verify no exposure
column5: Secrets retrieved securely without exposure in logs

column3: Validate static code analysis in pipeline
column4: 1. Configure SonarCloud 2. Run analysis 3. Check quality gates 4. Verify blocking behavior
column5: Code analysis completes with quality gates enforced

column3: Test dependency vulnerability scanning
column4: 1. Configure scanner 2. Scan dependencies 3. Review report 4. Test policy enforcement
column5: Dependencies scanned with vulnerabilities reported

column3: Verify agent pool configuration and job assignment
column4: 1. Configure agent pool 2. Queue test build 3. Monitor assignment 4. Verify completion
column5: Jobs assigned to correct agent pool and complete successfully

column3: Test variable group usage across pipelines
column4: 1. Create variable group 2. Link to pipeline 3. Reference variables 4. Verify resolution
column5: Variables resolved correctly in pipeline execution

column3: Validate Azure service connections for deployments
column4: 1. Configure service connection 2. Test authentication 3. Deploy resource 4. Verify access
column5: Service connections authenticate and deploy successfully

column3: Test deployment approval workflow
column4: 1. Configure approvers 2. Trigger deployment 3. Request approval 4. Complete deployment
column5: Approval workflow blocks deployment until approved

column3: Verify artifact retention and cleanup policies
column4: 1. Generate artifacts 2. Check retention 3. Verify cleanup 4. Test manual deletion
column5: Artifacts retained per policy and cleaned up correctly

column3: Description
column4: Test Steps
column5: Expected Results

column3: Measure build execution time for standard applications
column4: 1. Configure benchmark build 2. Execute multiple times 3. Measure duration 4. Calculate average
column5: Build time under 10 minutes for standard applications

column3: Test deployment time for blue-green deployments
column4: 1. Configure deployment 2. Execute deployment 3. Measure duration 4. Verify zero-downtime
column5: Deployment completes under 5 minutes with zero downtime

column3: Measure job queue wait time during peak usage
column4: 1. Queue multiple jobs 2. Monitor queue time 3. Test during peak 4. Document results
column5: Queue time under 2 minutes during normal operations

column3: Test maximum concurrent job execution
column4: 1. Queue 10+ jobs 2. Monitor parallel execution 3. Check resource usage 4. Verify completion
column5: 10 parallel jobs execute without resource conflicts

column3: Verify 99.9% availability for DevOps services
column4: 1. Configure monitoring 2. Track uptime 30 days 3. Log incidents 4. Calculate availability
column5: Platform maintains 99.9% or higher availability

column3: Test agent pool auto-scaling under load
column4: 1. Generate high load 2. Monitor scaling 3. Verify new agents 4. Test scale-in
column5: Agent pool scales appropriately with load changes

column3: Test Git performance with large repositories
column4: 1. Create large repo 2. Test clone time 3. Measure push/pull 4. Test history queries
column5: Large repositories perform within acceptable limits

column3: Measure DevOps REST API response times
column4: 1. Configure test suite 2. Execute API calls 3. Measure latency 4. Calculate percentiles
column5: API response time under 500ms for 95th percentile

column3: Test system performance with multiple concurrent users
column4: 1. Simulate users 2. Execute parallel actions 3. Monitor performance 4. Check degradation
column5: System supports 100+ concurrent users without degradation

column3: Test backup and restore performance
column4: 1. Execute backup 2. Measure duration 3. Test restore 4. Verify integrity
column5: Backup and restore complete within RTO/RPO targets

column3: Measure security scanning impact on pipeline duration
column4: 1. Configure full scanning 2. Measure pipeline time 3. Compare with baseline 4. Optimize if needed
column5: Security scanning adds less than 5 minutes to pipeline

column3: Test image push/pull performance at scale
column4: 1. Push multiple images 2. Measure upload time 3. Test parallel pulls 4. Document throughput
column5: Container operations complete within performance targets
